body_html:
@ahkarami we're finding it very hard to repro what you are seeing. @ngimel had just (again) tried to repro 8xK80 imagenet training yesterday and it worked fine #1637 (comment).

We cant reproduce the speed issues nor the memory-imbalance issues.

@zou3519 will work on trying the same on AWS instances and reproducing your issues.

Once we can repro the issue, i think we can help fix issues properly.
